basic.name: Basic
basic.description: Common rights most users should probably have.

user_administration.name: User administration
user_administration.description: Rights for administrating other user's accounts.

create_account.name: Create user accounts
create_account.description: Create new users. Already existing users will be able to create other accounts as well.

update_features.name: Toggle features
update_features.description: Allows enabling and disabling y's features via the Features page.

delete_user.name: Delete users
delete_user.description: Unlike blocking or hiding, deleting a user is an irreversible action. All data related to a deleted user is forever lost.

change_user_password.name: Change user's password
change_user_password.description: Update user's password. Target user will not necessarily be notified of the change.

manage_user_groups.name: Manage user groups
manage_user_groups.description: Allows control over user groups & it's rights.

assign_user_groups.name: Update user's groups
assign_user_groups.description: Allows assigning and removing groups from a user.

storage_upload.name: Upload files
storage_upload.description: A general right to upload data onto a storage endpoint. This is a "first check" right, meaning that it is required for any upload action. Users that do not have this right are guranteed to not be able to upload anything anywhere, while users that do may still be restricted by other permissions checks, such as per endpoint, per folder, or per file.

storage_list.name: List files
storage_list.description: A general right to see files on a storage endpoint. This is a "first check" right, meaning that it is required to list files on any endpoint. Users that do not have this right are guranteed to not be able to see files on any endpoint, while users that do may still be restricted by other permissions checks, such as per endpoint, per folder, or per file.

storage_delete.name: Delete files
storage_delete.description: A general right to delete files and folders from a storage endpoint. This is a "first check" right, meaning that it is required in order to delete any entry from any endpoint. Users that do not have this right are guranteed to not be able to delete entries, while users that do may still be restricted by other permissions checks, such as per endpoint, per folder, or per file.

storage_download.name: Download files
storage_download.description: A general right to download files from a storage endpoint. This is a "first check" right, meaning that it is required to download any file from any endpoint. Users that do not have this right are guranteed to not be able to download files, while users that do may still be restricted by other permissions checks, such as per endpoint, per folder, or per file.

userRightTagDescription.inherited: This right is inherited from "user" or "everyone" group.
userRightTagDescription.administrative: This right is very dangerous and could allow complete access to the system. It may also give access to restricted or personal infomation and be highly desctructive. Only the most trusted individuals should have this assigned.

user_groups_blacklist.label: Blacklisted groups
user_groups_blacklist.description: Prevent changing password for users of these groups.

mutable_user_rights.label: Mutable user rights
mutable_user_rights.description: Rights that are allowed to be added or removed from a group.

allow_assigning_any_group.description: Allow assigning any group to a user.

assignable_user_groups.label: Assignable user groups
assignable_user_groups.description: List of user groups that are allowed to be assigned or removed from a user.

code.create_storage_endpoint.base_path_does_n: Base path points to a non-existing directory
code.create_storage_endpoint.base_path_not_a_: Base path does not point to a directory
code.create_storage_endpoint.base_path_not_ab: Base path must be an absolute path
